title: Hot Sauce Project - Air Quality Monitoring System
description: The Hot Sauce Project addresses the unpredictable air quality in the Northeastern University building by implementing an IoT-based air quality monitoring system. This system tracks key environmental factors in real time, helping ensure a healthier and more comfortable indoor environment.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Developing a movie recommendation system using the Netflix dataset and LLM-based embeddings. Leveraging FAISS for efficient similarity search and Pandas/NumPy for data preprocessing. Implementing semantic search with Scikit-learn for vector operations and similarity calculations. Currently optimizing performance and exploring deployment with Flask/FastAPI and visualization via Streamlit.

title: CatX - Twitter Clone
description: A social media app similar to Twitter was built using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js, allowing users to post updates, manage profiles, and interact. Secure logins and a smooth, mobile-friendly design were implemented, and the app was successfully deployed online.

title: Minesweeper
description: A responsive web version of the classic Minesweeper game was created using JavaScript and React, featuring different difficulty levels, smooth navigation across multiple pages, and a responsive design for any device.

title: Rideshare Driver Validation System
description: A Java-based system was developed for driver registration and validation, ensuring compliance with license, vehicle, and insurance requirements. OOP principles and File I/O were used to filter ineligible drivers, with querying features for driver details and a 90% test coverage achieved through JUnit testing.
